TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BrowserLaunchType extends System.Enum

Docs.remarks: Recommended to use the SystemBrowser as it is the default and falls back to UriLauncher.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Caboodle.BrowserLaunchType External = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Launch an external browser using the system's default launcher (eg: Safari or Chrome).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Microsoft.Caboodle.BrowserLaunchType SystemPreferred = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Launch the optimized system browser and stay inside of your application. (Chrome Custom Tabs and SFSafariViewController).
